name: Clefable
flavorText: With its acute hearing, it can pick up sounds from far away. It usually hides in quiet places.
Attack1Text: Return 1 of your Pokémon and all cards attached to it in your hand.

name: Deoxys
flavorText: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Psychic Energy attached to Deoxys and remove 6 damage counters from Deoxys.

name: Dialga
flavorText: This Pokémon completely controls the flow of time. It uses its power to travel at will through the past and future.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck.

name: Espeon
flavorText: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy's actions.
Attack1Text: Move up to 4 damage counters from any of your Pokémon to any of your opponent's Pokémon in any way you like.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Forretress
flavorText: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside this shell is a total mystery.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.
Attack2Text: Does 30 damage times the number of Pineco and Forretress you have in play. This attack does 30 damage to each of your Pineco and Forretress in play.

name: Groudon
flavorText: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. If tails, discard the top 4 cards of your deck.

name: Gyarados
flavorText: Once it appears, it goes on a rampage. It remains enraged until it demolishes everything around it.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Hitmontop
flavorText: It launches kicks while spinning. If it spins at high speed, it may bore its way into the ground.
Attack1Text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Hitmontop by attacks is increased by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Ho-Oh
flavorText: Legends claim this Pokémon flies the world's skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Fire Energy attached to Ho-Oh.

name: Houndoom
flavorText: Upon hearing its eerie howls, other Pokémon get the shivers and head straight back to their nests.
Attack1Text: If your opponent has any Fighting Pokémon in play, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage.
Attack2Text: Your opponent discards a card from his or her hand.

name: Jirachi
flavorText: Generations have believed that any wish written on a note on its head will come true when it awakens.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Jirachi from your hand onto your Bench, you may flip 3 coins. For each heads, search your discard pile for a Psychic Energy card and attach it to Jirachi.
Attack1Text: Choose a number of your opponent's Stage 1 or Stage 2 Evolved Pokémon up to the amount of Energy attached to Jirachi. Remove the highest Stage Evolution card from each of those Pokémon and put those cards back into your opponent's hand.

name: Kyogre
flavorText: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. If tails, this attack does 40 damage to each of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Leafeon
flavorText: When you see Leafeon asleep in a patch of sunshine, you'll know it is using photosynthesis to produce clean air.
Attack1Text: Does 50 damage times the number of Special Conditions affecting the Defending Pokémon.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Lucario
flavorText: It's said that no foe can remain invisible to Lucario, since it can detect auras. Even foes it could not otherwise see.
Attack1Text: Does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each of your Pokémon in the Lost Zone.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Lugia
flavorText: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Magmortar
flavorText: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.
Attack1Text: Discard the top 3 cards from your deck. This attack does 50 damage times the number of Energy cards you discarded.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Fire Energy attached to Magmortar.

name: Ninetales
flavorText: Its nine beautiful tails are filled with a wondrous energy that could keep it alive for 1,000 years.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a Fire Energy from your hand. If you do, draw 3 cards. This power can't be used if Ninetales is affected by a Special Condition.

name: Pachirisu
flavorText: It's one of the kinds of Pokémon with electric cheek pouches. It shoots charges from its tail.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn, when you put Pachirisu from your hand onto your Bench, you may attach up to 2 Lightning Energy cards from your hand to Pachirisu.
Attack1Text: Put all Energy cards attached to Pachirisu in the Lost Zone.

name: Palkia
flavorText: Its total control over the boundaries of space enable it to transport itself to faraway places or even other dimensions.
Attack1Text: Switch Palkia with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Then, your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Rayquaza
flavorText: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy and a Lightning Energy attached to Rayquaza.

name: Smeargle
flavorText: Once it becomes an adult, it has a tendency to let its comrades plant footprints on its back.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Smeargle is your Active Pokémon, you may look at your opponent's hand. If you do, choose a Supporter card you find there and use the effect of that card as the effect of this power. This power can't be used if Smeargle is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.

name: Umbreon
flavorText: When agitated, this Pokémon protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Umbreon by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon than has any Poké-Powers or Poké-Bodies.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Ampharos
flavorText: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 2 basic Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Ampharos does 20 damage to itself.

name: Cleffa
flavorText: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.
Ability1Text: As long as Cleffa is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Cleffa by attacks.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 6 cards. Cleffa is now Asleep.

name: Feraligatr
flavorText: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Granbull
flavorText: Because its fangs are too heavy, it always keeps its head tilted down. However, its bite is powerful.
Attack1Text: Granbull does 20 damage to itself. Switch Granbull with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.
Attack2Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on Granbull.

name: Meganium
flavorText: Meganium's breath has the power to revive dead grass and plants. It can make them healthy again.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Meganium.

name: Mismagius
flavorText: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.
Attack2Text: Look at your opponent's hand. This attack does 30 damage times the number of Trainer, Supporter, and Stadium cards in your opponent's hand.

name: Mr. Mime
flavorText: Its fingertips emit a peculiar force field that hardens air to create an actual wall.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may have both you and your opponent reveal your hands. This power can't be used if Mr. Mime is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

name: Pidgeot
flavorText: It spreads its beautiful wings wide to frighten its enemies. It can fly at Mach 2 speed.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn, the attack cost of each of the Defending Pokémon's attacks is ColorlessColorless more.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Skarmory
flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Slowking
flavorText: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may look at the top 3 cards of either player's deck and put them back on top of that player's deck in any order. This power can't be used if Slowking is affected by a Special Condition.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Snorlax
flavorText: Its stomach's digestive juices can dissolve any kind of poison. It can even eat things off the ground.
Attack1Text: Remove all damage counters from Snorlax. Snorlax can't use Layabout during your next turn.
Attack2Text: Put 1 Energy card attached to Snorlax in the Lost Zone.

name: Tangrowth
flavorText: Its vines grow so profusely that, in the warm season, you can't even see its eyes.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage times the number of Energy attached to Tangrowth.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed. If tails, put 1 Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon in the Lost Zone.

name: Typhlosion
flavorText: It has a secret, devastating move. It rubs its blazing fur together to cause huge explosions.
Attack2Text: Discard 2 Energy attached to Typhlosion.

name: Tyrogue
flavorText: Even though it is small, it can't be ignored because it will slug any handy target without warning.
Ability1Text: As long as Tyrogue is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Tyrogue by attacks.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance. Tyrogue is now Asleep.

name: Ursaring
flavorText: With its ability to distinguish any aroma, it unfailing finds all food buried deep underground.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage plus 30 more damage.

name: Weezing
flavorText: If one of the twin Koffing inflates, the other one deflates. It constantly mixes its poisonous gases.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: Weezing does 90 damage to itself, and don't apply Weakness to this damage.

name: Zangoose
flavorText: Its fur would all stand on end if it smelled a Seviper nearby. Its sharp claws tear up its foes.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Zangoose's Lost Claw attack's base damage is 80.
Attack2Text: Choose 1 card from your opponent's hand without looking and put it in the Lost Zone.

name: Bayleef
flavorText: A spicy aroma emanates from around its neck. The aroma acts as a stimulant to restore health.

name: Croconaw
flavorText: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

name: Donphan
flavorText: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its tackle is strong enough to knock down a house.
Attack1Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 70 damage times the number of heads.

name: Flaaffy
flavorText: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won't grow.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
Attack2Text: If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

name: Flareon
flavorText: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to Flareon.

name: Jolteon
flavorText: It concentrates the weak electric charges emitted by its cells and launches wicked lightning bolts.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Jolteon during your opponent's next turn.

name: Magby
flavorText: It is found in volcanic craters. Its body temperature is over 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit, so don't underestimate it.
Ability1Text: As long as Magby is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Magby by attacks.
Attack1Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Burned. Magby is now Asleep.

name: Mime Jr.
flavorText: In an attempt to confuse its enemy, it mimics the enemy's movements. Then it wastes no time in making itself scarce!
Ability1Text: As long as Mime Jr. is Asleep, prevent all damage done to Mime Jr. by attacks.
Attack1Text: Put the top card of your opponent's deck in the Lost Zone. Mime Jr. is now Asleep.

name: Pidgeotto
flavorText: It renders its prey immobile using well-developed claws, then carries the prey more than 60 miles to its nest.
Attack2Text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are tails, this attack does nothing. For each heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Quilava
flavorText: This Pokémon is fully covered by nonflammable fur. It can withstand any kind of fire attack.
Attack2Text: Discard an Energy attached to Quilava.

name: Riolu
flavorText: They communicate with one another using their auras. They are able to run all through the night.
Attack1Text: Riolu can't attack during your next turn.

name: Seviper
flavorText: In battle, it uses its bladed tail to counter any Zangoose. It secretes a deadly venom in its tail.
Attack1Text: Seviper is now Poisoned.
Attack2Text: If Seviper is Poisoned, this attack does 20 damage plus 60 more damage and remove the Special Condition Poisoned from Seviper.

name: Vaporeon
flavorText: When Vaporeon's fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters from Vaporeon.
Attack2Text: Choose 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to each of them. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Chikorita
flavorText: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up sunrays.
Attack1Text: Remove 1 damage counter from Chikorita.
Attack2Text: Chikorita does 10 damage to itself.

name: Clefairy
flavorText: The moonlight that it stores in the wings on its back apparently gives it the ability to float in midair.
Attack1Text: During your opponent's next turn ,any damage done to Clefairy by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Cyndaquil
flavorText: It is timid, and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Cyndaquil.

name: Eevee
evolvesTo: Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Sylveon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, Glaceon
flavorText: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.

name: Hitmonchan
flavorText: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Hitmonchan during your opponent's next turn.
Attack2Text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Resistance.

name: Hitmonlee
flavorText: If it starts kicking repeatedly, both legs will stretch even longer to strike a fleeing foe.

name: Houndour
flavorText: To corner prey, they check each other's location using barks that only they can understand.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Koffing
flavorText: Its thin, filmy body is filled with gases that cause constant sniffles, coughs and teary eyes.
Attack1Text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

name: Magikarp
flavorText: For no reason, it jumps and splashes about, making it easy for predators like Pidgeotto to catch it mid-jump.

name: Magmar
flavorText: It dislikes cold places, so it blows scorching flames to make the environment suitable for itself.

name: Mareep
flavorText: Its fleece grows continually. In the summer, the fleece is fully shed, but it grows back in a week.

name: Mawile
flavorText: It chomps with its gaping mouth. Its huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed.
Attack1Text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may put it into your hand. If not, discard it and draw a card.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed and discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

name: Misdreavus
flavorText: It loves to bite and yank people's hair from behind without warning, just to see their shocked reactions.
Attack2Text: Each player draws 3 cards.

name: Phanpy
flavorText: As a sign of affection, it bumps with its snout. However, it is so strong, it may send you flying.
Ability1Text: As long as Phanpy has Energy attached to it, any damage done to Phanpy by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Pidgey
flavorText: Common in grassy areas and forests, it is very docile and will chase off enemies by flapping up sand.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Pokémon, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle Pidgey and all cards attached to it back into your deck.

name: Pineco
flavorText: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn't bother it.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, Pineco's Surprise Attack attack's base damage is 80.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Relicanth
flavorText: Discovered by chance during deep-sea explorations, it has not changed since ancient times.
Attack1Text: Choose a card from your hand and put it in the Lost Zone. Then, draw 3 cards.
Attack2Text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Relicanth by attacks is reduced by 30 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

name: Slowpoke
flavorText: It lazes vacantly near water. If something bites its tail, it won't even notice for a whole day.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Snubbull
flavorText: It has an active, playful nature. Many women like to frolic with it because of its affectionate ways.
Attack1Text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Tangela
flavorText: It tangles any moving thing with its vines. Their subtle shaking is ticklish if you get ensnared.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Grass Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

name: Teddiursa
flavorText: If it finds honey, its crescent mark glows. It always licks its paws because they are soaked with honey.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent can't play any Trainer cards from his or her hand during your opponent's next turn, and any damage done to Teddiursa by attack is reduced by 30 (after applying weakness and resistance).

name: Totodile
flavorText: It is small but rough and tough. It won't hesitate to take a bite out of anything that moves.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin for each Water Energy attached to Totodile. This attack does 30 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

name: Vulpix
flavorText: If it is attacked by an enemy that is stronger than itself, it feigns injury to fool the enemy and escapes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard a Fire Energy attached to Vulpix.

name: Deoxys
flavorText: DNA from a space virus mutated and became a Pokémon. It appears where auroras are seen.
Attack1Text: Discard 2 Psychic Energy attached to Deoxys and remove 6 damage counters from Deoxys.

name: Dialga
flavorText: This Pokémon completely controls the flow of time. It uses its power to travel at will through the past and future.
Attack1Text: Shuffle your hand into your deck.

name: Entei
flavorText: A Pokémon that races across the land. It is said that one is born every time a new volcano appears.
Ability1Text: Entei's Retreat Cost is Colorless Energy less for each Fire Energy attached to Entei.
Attack1Text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.

name: Groudon
flavorText: Said to have expanded the lands by evaporating water with raging heat. It battled titanically with Kyogre.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard the top 4 cards of your opponent's deck. If tails, discard the top 4 cards of your deck.

name: Ho-Oh
flavorText: Legends claim this Pokémon flies the world's skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Fire Energy attached to Ho-Oh.

name: Kyogre
flavorText: A mythical Pokémon said to have swelled the seas with rain and tidal waves. It battled with Groudon.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. If tails, this attack does 40 damage to each of your Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Lugia
flavorText: It is said to be the guardian of the seas. It is rumored to have been seen on the night of a storm.
Attack1Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 30 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

name: Palkia
flavorText: Its total control over the boundaries of space enable it to transport itself to faraway places or even other dimensions.
Attack1Text: Switch Palkia with 1 of your Benched Pokémon. Then, your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

name: Raikou
flavorText: A Pokémon that races across the land while barking a cry that sounds like crashing thunder.
Ability1Text: Raikou's Retreat Cost is Colorless less for each Lightning Energy attached to Raikou.
Attack1Text: Does 20 damage to 1 of your Pokémon and don't apply Weakness and Resistance to this damage.

name: Rayquaza
flavorText: It flies in the ozone layer, way up high in the sky. Until recently, no one had ever seen it.
Attack1Text: Discard a Fire Energy and a Lightning Energy attached to Rayquaza.

name: Suicune
flavorText: This Pokémon races across the land. It is said that north winds will somehow blow whenever it appears.
Ability1Text: Suicune's Retreat Cost is Colorless less for each Water Energy attached to Suicune.
Attack1Text: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
